description: The Aid Activity database registers information on where aid goes at the level of individual aid receiving countries.  The countries are categorised  as developing countries or territories eligible to receive official development assistance (ODA).

indicator: OECD DAC1: total flows by donor
source: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
description: Official and Private Flows - Disbursements and Commitments. Aggregate data (no breakdown by recipient) on ODA, OOF, private and NGO data by donor, type of aid and flow.

indicator: OECD DAC2A: ODA to countries and regions
source: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
description: Destination of Official Development Assistance Disbursements. Geographical breakdown by donor, recipient and for some types of aid (e.g. grant, loan, technical co-operation) on a disbursement basis (i.e. actual expenditures).

indicator: OECD DAC2B: OOFs and export credits
source: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
description: OOFs and export credits by donor and recipient. Breakdown for amounts extended, amounts received and interest.

indicator: OECD DAC5: ODA by sector and donor
source: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
description: Official Bilateral Commitments (or Gross Disbursements) by Sector. Aggregates (no breakdown by recipient) by donor, sector, and type of flow to developing countries.
